<p align="center">"<i>Knowledge is powerful, be careful how you use it!</i>"</p>
<h4 align="center"><a id="user-content-a-collection-of-inspiring-lists-manuals-cheatsheets-blogs-hacks-one-liners-cliweb-tools-and-more" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#a-collection-of-inspiring-lists-manuals-cheatsheets-blogs-hacks-one-liners-cliweb-tools-and-more"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>A collection of inspiring lists, manuals, cheatsheets, blogs, hacks, one-liners, cli/web tools, and more.</h4>

<h2><a id="user-content-notebook_with_decorative_cover-what-is-it" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#notebook_with_decorative_cover-what-is-it"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="notebook_with_decorative_cover" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f4d4.png">📔</g-emoji>  What is it?</h2>
<p>This repository is a collection of various materials and tools that I use every day in my work. It contains a lot of useful information gathered in one piece. It is an invaluable source of knowledge for me that I often look back on.</p>
<h2><a id="user-content-restroom-for-whom" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#restroom-for-whom"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="restroom" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f6bb.png">🚻</g-emoji>  For whom?</h2>
<p>For everyone, really. Here everyone can find their favourite tastes. But to be perfectly honest, it is aimed towards System and Network administrators, DevOps, Pentesters, and Security Researchers.</p>
<h2><a id="user-content-information_source-contributing" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#information_source-contributing"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="information_source" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2139.png">ℹ️</g-emoji>  Contributing</h2>
<p>If you find something which doesn't make sense, or something doesn't seem right, please make a pull request and please add valid and well-reasoned explanations about your changes or comments.</p>
<p>A few simple rules for this project:</p>
<ul>
<li>inviting and clear</li>
<li>not tiring</li>
<li>useful</li>
</ul>
<p>These below rules may be better:</p>
<ul>
<li>easy to contribute to (Markdown + HTML ...)</li>
<li>easy to find (simple TOC, maybe it's worth extending them?)</li>
</ul>
<p>Url marked <strong>*</strong> is temporary unavailable. Please don't delete it without confirming that it has permanently expired.</p>
<p>Before adding a pull request, please see the <strong><a href="/trimstray/the-book-of-secret-knowledge/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md">contributing guidelines</a></strong>. You should also remember about this:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-diff position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="+ This repository is not meant to contain everything but only good quality stuff.
"><pre><span class="pl-mi1"><span class="pl-mi1">+</span> This repository is not meant to contain everything but only good quality stuff.</span></pre></div>
<p>All <strong>suggestions/PR</strong> are welcome!</p>

<h4><a id="user-content-cli-tools-toc" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#cli-tools-toc"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>CLI Tools  <a href="#anger-table-of-contents"><sup>[TOC]</sup></a></h4>
<h5><a id="user-content-black_small_square-shells" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#black_small_square-shells"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="black_small_square" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/25aa.png">▪️</g-emoji> Shells</h5>
<p>
  <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="small_orange_diamond" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f538.png">🔸</g-emoji> <a href="https://www.gnu.org/software/bash/" rel="nofollow"><b>GNU Bash</b></a> - is an sh-compatible shell that incorporates useful features from the Korn shell and C shell.<br>

<h6><a id="user-content-hack-mozilla-firefox-address-bar" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#hack-mozilla-firefox-address-bar"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Hack Mozilla Firefox address bar</h6>
<p>In Firefox's address bar, you can limit results by typing special characters before or after your term:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>^</code> - for matches in your browsing history</li>
<li><code>*</code> - for matches in your bookmarks.</li>
<li><code>%</code> - for matches in your currently open tabs.</li>
<li><code>#</code> - for matches in page titles.</li>
<li><code>@</code> - for matches in web addresses.</li>
</ul>

<h6><a id="user-content-bypass-wafs-by-shortening-ip-address-by-0xinfection" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bypass-wafs-by-shortening-ip-address-by-0xinfection"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Bypass WAFs by Shortening IP Address (by <a href="https://twitter.com/0xInfection" rel="nofollow">0xInfection</a>)</h6>
<p>IP addresses can be shortened by dropping the zeroes:</p>
<div class="snippet-clipboard-content position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="http://1.0.0.1 → http://1.1
http://127.0.0.1 → http://127.1
http://192.168.0.1 → http://192.168.1

http://0xC0A80001 or http://3232235521 → 192.168.0.1
http://192.168.257 → 192.168.1.1
http://192.168.516 → 192.168.2.4
"><pre><code>http://1.0.0.1 → http://1.1
http://127.0.0.1 → http://127.1
http://192.168.0.1 → http://192.168.1

http://0xC0A80001 or http://3232235521 → 192.168.0.1
http://192.168.257 → 192.168.1.1
http://192.168.516 → 192.168.2.4
</code></pre></div>
<blockquote>
<p>This bypasses WAF filters for SSRF, open-redirect, etc where any IP as input gets blacklisted.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>For more information please see <a href="http://www.pc-help.org/obscure.htm" rel="nofollow">How to Obscure Any URL</a> and <a href="https://stuff-things.net/2014/09/25/magic-ip-address-shortcuts/" rel="nofollow">Magic IP Address Shortcuts</a>.</p>
<h6><a id="user-content-hashing-encryption-and-encoding-by-michal-špaček" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#hashing-encryption-and-encoding-by-michal-špaček"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Hashing, encryption and encoding (by <a href="https://twitter.com/spazef0rze" rel="nofollow">Michal Špaček</a>)</h6>
<p><em>Hashing</em></p>
<p>plaintext <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_right" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/27a1.png">➡️</g-emoji> hash<br>
hash <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="no_entry" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/26d4.png">⛔</g-emoji> plaintext</p>
<p><em>Symmetric encryption</em></p>
<p>plaintext <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_right" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/27a1.png">➡️</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="key" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f511.png">🔑</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_right" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/27a1.png">➡️</g-emoji> ciphertext<br>
plaintext <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_left" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2b05.png">⬅️</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="key" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f511.png">🔑</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_left" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2b05.png">⬅️</g-emoji> ciphertext<br>
(<g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="key" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f511.png">🔑</g-emoji> shared key)</p>
<p><em>Asymmetric encryption</em></p>
<p>plaintext <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_right" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/27a1.png">➡️</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="key" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f511.png">🔑</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_right" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/27a1.png">➡️</g-emoji> ciphertext<br>
plaintext <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_left" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2b05.png">⬅️</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="part_alternation_mark" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/303d.png">〽️</g-emoji> <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="arrow_left" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2b05.png">⬅️</g-emoji> ciphertext<br>

<h6><a id="user-content-sterilize-bash-history" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#sterilize-bash-history"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Sterilize bash history</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="function sterile() {

  history | awk '$2 != &quot;history&quot; { $1=&quot;&quot;; print $0 }' | egrep -vi &quot;\
curl\b+.*(-E|--cert)\b+.*\b*|\
curl\b+.*--pass\b+.*\b*|\
curl\b+.*(-U|--proxy-user).*:.*\b*|\
curl\b+.*(-u|--user).*:.*\b*
.*(-H|--header).*(token|auth.*)\b+.*|\
wget\b+.*--.*password\b+.*\b*|\
http.?://.+:.+@.*\
&quot; &gt; $HOME/histbuff; history -r $HOME/histbuff;

}

export PROMPT_COMMAND=&quot;sterile&quot;
"><pre><span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">sterile()</span> {

  <span class="pl-c1">history</span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> awk <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>$2 != "history" { $1=""; print $0 }<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> egrep -vi <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">curl\b+.*(-E|--cert)\b+.*\b*|<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">curl\b+.*--pass\b+.*\b*|<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">curl\b+.*(-U|--proxy-user).*:.*\b*|<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">curl\b+.*(-u|--user).*:.*\b*</span>
<span class="pl-s">.*(-H|--header).*(token|auth.*)\b+.*|<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">wget\b+.*--.*password\b+.*\b*|<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">http.?://.+:.+@.*<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> <span class="pl-smi">$HOME</span>/histbuff<span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-c1">history</span> -r <span class="pl-smi">$HOME</span>/histbuff<span class="pl-k">;</span>

}

<span class="pl-k">export</span> PROMPT_COMMAND=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>sterile<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<blockquote>
<p>Look also: <a href="https://github.com/lbonanomi/go/blob/master/revisionist.go">A naive utility to censor credentials in command history</a>.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="cat &gt; /etc/profile &lt;&lt; __EOF__
_after_logout() {

  username=$(whoami)

  for _pid in $(ps afx | grep sshd | grep &quot;$username&quot; | awk '{print $1}') ; do

    kill -9 $_pid

  done

}
trap _after_logout EXIT
__EOF__
"><pre>cat <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> /etc/profile <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">_after_logout() {</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">  username=$(whoami)</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">  for _pid in $(ps afx | grep sshd | grep "$username" | awk '{print $1}') ; do</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">    kill -9 $_pid</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">  done</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">}</span>
<span class="pl-s">trap _after_logout EXIT</span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></pre></div>

find . -user &lt;username&gt; -print

# Group:
find /opt -group &lt;group&gt;
find /etc -type f -group &lt;group&gt; -iname &quot;*.conf&quot;
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> User:</span>
find <span class="pl-c1">.</span> -user <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>username<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> -print

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Group:</span>
find /opt -group <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>group<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>
find /etc -type f -group <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>group<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> -iname <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>*.conf<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-find-files-and-directories-for-all-without-specific-usergroup" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#find-files-and-directories-for-all-without-specific-usergroup"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Find files and directories for all without specific user/group</h6>

find . \! -user &lt;username&gt; -print

# Group:
find . \! -group &lt;group&gt;
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> User:</span>
find <span class="pl-c1">.</span> <span class="pl-cce">\!</span> -user <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>username<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> -print

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Group:</span>
find <span class="pl-c1">.</span> <span class="pl-cce">\!</span> -group <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>group<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-looking-for-filesdirectories-that-only-have-certain-permission" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#looking-for-filesdirectories-that-only-have-certain-permission"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Looking for files/directories that only have certain permission</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# User

find /home -user $(whoami) -perm 777 # -rwxrwxrwx

# Group:
find /home -type d -group &lt;group&gt; -perm 755 # -rwxr-xr-x
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> User</span>
find <span class="pl-c1">.</span> -user <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>username<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> -perm -u+rw <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> -rw-r--r--</span>
find /home -user <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>whoami<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span> -perm 777 <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> -rwxrwxrwx</span>

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Group:</span>
find /home -type d -group <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>group<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> -perm 755 <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> -rwxr-xr-x</span></pre></div>

"><pre>vmstat 2 20 -t -w</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>2</code> - number of times with a defined time interval (delay)</li>

</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# 1:
cp /bin/ls chmod.01
cp /bin/chmod chmod.01
./chmod.01 700 file

# 2:
/bin/busybox chmod 0700 /bin/chmod

# 3:
setfacl --set u::rwx,g::---,o::--- /bin/chmod
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 1:</span>

cp /bin/chmod chmod.01
./chmod.01 700 file

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 2:</span>
/bin/busybox chmod 0700 /bin/chmod

<h6><a id="user-content-record-and-replay-terminal-session" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#record-and-replay-terminal-session"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Record and replay terminal session</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="### Record session
# 1)
script -t 2&gt;~/session.time -a ~/session.log

# 2)
script --timing=session.time session.log

### Replay session
scriptreplay --timing=session.time session.log
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## Record session</span>
<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 1)</span>
script -t <span class="pl-k">2&gt;</span>~/session.time -a <span class="pl-k">~</span>/session.log

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 2)</span>
script --timing=session.time session.log

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## Replay session</span>

( _ciph=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>aes128<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_pass=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private_pass.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl rsa -<span class="pl-smi">${_ciph}</span> -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_pass}</span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-check-private-key" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#check-private-key"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Check private key</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; \
openssl rsa -check -in ${_fd} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl rsa -check -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-get-public-key-from-private-key" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#get-public-key-from-private-key"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Get public key from private key</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_pub=&quot;public.key&quot; ; \
openssl rsa -pubout -in ${_fd} -out ${_fd_pub} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_pub=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>public.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl rsa -pubout -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_pub}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-private-key-and-csr" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-private-key-and-csr"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate private key and CSR</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;request.csr&quot; ; _len=&quot;2048&quot; ; \
openssl req -out ${_fd_csr} -new -newkey rsa:${_len} -nodes -keyout ${_fd} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>request.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _len=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>2048<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> -new -newkey rsa:<span class="pl-smi">${_len}</span> -nodes -keyout <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-csr" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-csr"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate CSR</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;request.csr&quot; ; \
openssl req -out ${_fd_csr} -new -key ${_fd} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>request.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> -new -key <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-csr-metadata-from-existing-certificate" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-csr-metadata-from-existing-certificate"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate CSR (metadata from existing certificate)</h6>
<blockquote>
<p>Where <code>private.key</code> is the existing private key. As you can see you do not generate this CSR from your certificate (public key). Also you do not generate the "same" CSR, just a new one to request a new certificate.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;request.csr&quot; ; _fd_crt=&quot;cert.crt&quot; ; \
openssl x509 -x509toreq -in ${_fd_crt} -out ${_fd_csr} -signkey ${_fd} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>request.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_crt=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>cert.crt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl x509 -x509toreq -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_crt}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> -signkey <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-csr-with--config-param" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-csr-with--config-param"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate CSR with -config param</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;request.csr&quot; ; \
openssl req -new -sha256 -key ${_fd} -out ${_fd_csr} \
-config &lt;(
cat &lt;&lt; __EOF__
[req]
default_bits        = 2048
default_md          = sha256
prompt              = no
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext

[ dn ]
C   = &quot;&lt;two-letter ISO abbreviation for your country&gt;&quot;
ST  = &quot;&lt;state or province where your organisation is legally located&gt;&quot;
L   = &quot;&lt;city where your organisation is legally located&gt;&quot;
O   = &quot;&lt;legal name of your organisation&gt;&quot;
OU  = &quot;&lt;section of the organisation&gt;&quot;
CN  = &quot;&lt;fully qualified domain name&gt;&quot;

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = &lt;fully qualified domain name&gt;
DNS.2 = &lt;next domain&gt;
DNS.3 = &lt;next domain&gt;
__EOF__
))
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>request.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -new -sha256 -key <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> \
-config <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">&lt;(</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">cat <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[req]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">default_bits        = 2048</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">default_md          = sha256</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">prompt              = no</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">distinguished_name  = dn</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">req_extensions      = req_ext</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ dn ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">C   = "&lt;two-letter ISO abbreviation for your country&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">ST  = "&lt;state or province where your organisation is legally located&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">L   = "&lt;city where your organisation is legally located&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">O   = "&lt;legal name of your organisation&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">OU  = "&lt;section of the organisation&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">CN  = "&lt;fully qualified domain name&gt;"</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ req_ext ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">subjectAltName = @alt_names</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ alt_names ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">DNS.1 = &lt;fully qualified domain name&gt;</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">DNS.2 = &lt;next domain&gt;</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">DNS.3 = &lt;next domain&gt;</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>)</pre></div>
<p>Other values in <code>[ dn ]</code>:</p>
<div class="snippet-clipboard-content position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="countryName            = &quot;DE&quot;                     # C=
stateOrProvinceName    = &quot;Hessen&quot;                 # ST=
localityName           = &quot;Keller&quot;                 # L=
postalCode             = &quot;424242&quot;                 # L/postalcode=
postalAddress          = &quot;Keller&quot;                 # L/postaladdress=
streetAddress          = &quot;Crater 1621&quot;            # L/street=
organizationName       = &quot;apfelboymschule&quot;        # O=
organizationalUnitName = &quot;IT Department&quot;          # OU=
commonName             = &quot;example.com&quot;            # CN=
emailAddress           = &quot;webmaster@example.com&quot;  # CN/emailAddress=
"><pre><code>countryName            = "DE"                     # C=
stateOrProvinceName    = "Hessen"                 # ST=
localityName           = "Keller"                 # L=
postalCode             = "424242"                 # L/postalcode=
postalAddress          = "Keller"                 # L/postaladdress=
streetAddress          = "Crater 1621"            # L/street=
organizationName       = "apfelboymschule"        # O=
organizationalUnitName = "IT Department"          # OU=
commonName             = "example.com"            # CN=
emailAddress           = "webmaster@example.com"  # CN/emailAddress=
</code></pre></div>
<p>Example of <code>oids</code> (you'll probably also have to make OpenSSL know about the new fields required for EV by adding the following under <code>[new_oids]</code>):</p>
<div class="snippet-clipboard-content position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="[req]
...
oid_section         = new_oids

[ new_oids ]
postalCode = 2.5.4.17
streetAddress = 2.5.4.9
"><pre><code>[req]
...
oid_section         = new_oids

[ new_oids ]
postalCode = 2.5.4.17
streetAddress = 2.5.4.9
</code></pre></div>
<p>Full example:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;request.csr&quot; ; \
openssl req -new -sha256 -key ${_fd} -out ${_fd_csr} \
-config &lt;(
cat &lt;&lt; __EOF__
[req]
default_bits        = 2048
default_md          = sha256
prompt              = no
distinguished_name  = dn
req_extensions      = req_ext
oid_section         = new_oids

[ new_oids ]
serialNumber = 2.5.4.5
streetAddress = 2.5.4.9
postalCode = 2.5.4.17
businessCategory = 2.5.4.15

[ dn ]
serialNumber=00001111
businessCategory=Private Organization
jurisdictionC=DE
C=DE
ST=Hessen
L=Keller
postalCode=424242
streetAddress=Crater 1621
O=AV Company
OU=IT
CN=example.com

[ req_ext ]
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[ alt_names ]
DNS.1 = example.com
__EOF__
))
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>request.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -new -sha256 -key <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> \
-config <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">&lt;(</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">cat <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[req]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">default_bits        = 2048</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">default_md          = sha256</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">prompt              = no</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">distinguished_name  = dn</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">req_extensions      = req_ext</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">oid_section         = new_oids</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ new_oids ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">serialNumber = 2.5.4.5</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">streetAddress = 2.5.4.9</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">postalCode = 2.5.4.17</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">businessCategory = 2.5.4.15</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ dn ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">serialNumber=00001111</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">businessCategory=Private Organization</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">jurisdictionC=DE</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">C=DE</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">ST=Hessen</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">L=Keller</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">postalCode=424242</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">streetAddress=Crater 1621</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">O=AV Company</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">OU=IT</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">CN=example.com</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ req_ext ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">subjectAltName = @alt_names</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">[ alt_names ]</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s">DNS.1 = example.com</span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>)</pre></div>

<h6><a id="user-content-list-available-ec-curves" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-available-ec-curves"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>List available EC curves</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="openssl ecparam -list_curves
"><pre>openssl ecparam -list_curves</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-print-ecdsa-private-and-public-keys" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#print-ecdsa-private-and-public-keys"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Print ECDSA private and public keys</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; \
openssl ec -in ${_fd} -noout -text )

# For x25519 only extracting public key
( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _fd_pub=&quot;public.key&quot; ; \
openssl pkey -in ${_fd} -pubout -out ${_fd_pub} )
"><pre>( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl ec -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -noout -text )

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> For x25519 only extracting public key</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_pub=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>public.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl pkey -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -pubout -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_pub}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-ecdsa-private-key" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-ecdsa-private-key"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate ECDSA private key</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# _curve: prime256v1, secp521r1, secp384r1
( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _curve=&quot;prime256v1&quot; ; \
openssl ecparam -out ${_fd} -name ${_curve} -genkey )

# _curve: X25519
( _fd=&quot;private.key&quot; ; _curve=&quot;x25519&quot; ; \
openssl genpkey -algorithm ${_curve} -out ${_fd} )
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _curve: prime256v1, secp521r1, secp384r1</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _curve=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>prime256v1<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl ecparam -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -name <span class="pl-smi">${_curve}</span> -genkey )

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _curve: X25519</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _curve=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>x25519<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl genpkey -algorithm <span class="pl-smi">${_curve}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-private-key-and-csr-ecc" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-private-key-and-csr-ecc"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate private key and CSR (ECC)</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# _curve: prime256v1, secp521r1, secp384r1
( _fd=&quot;domain.com.key&quot; ; _fd_csr=&quot;domain.com.csr&quot; ; _curve=&quot;prime256v1&quot; ; \
openssl ecparam -out ${_fd} -name ${_curve} -genkey ; \
openssl req -new -key ${_fd} -out ${_fd_csr} -sha256 )
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _curve: prime256v1, secp521r1, secp384r1</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.com.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_csr=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.com.csr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _curve=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>prime256v1<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl ecparam -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -name <span class="pl-smi">${_curve}</span> -genkey <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -new -key <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> -sha256 )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-self-signed-certificate" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-self-signed-certificate"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate self-signed certificate</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# _len: 2048, 4096
( _fd=&quot;domain.key&quot; ; _fd_out=&quot;domain.crt&quot; ; _len=&quot;2048&quot; ; _days=&quot;365&quot; ; \
openssl req -newkey rsa:${_len} -nodes \
-keyout ${_fd} -x509 -days ${_days} -out ${_fd_out} )
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _len: 2048, 4096</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_out=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.crt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _len=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>2048<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _days=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>365<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl req -newkey rsa:<span class="pl-smi">${_len}</span> -nodes \
-keyout <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -x509 -days <span class="pl-smi">${_days}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_out}</span> )</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-generate-self-signed-certificate-from-existing-private-key" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-self-signed-certificate-from-existing-private-key"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate self-signed certificate from existing private key</h6>

"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _len: 2048, 4096</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_out=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>domain.crt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _days=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>365<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \

<h6><a id="user-content-generate-self-signed-certificate-from-existing-private-key-and-csr" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#generate-self-signed-certificate-from-existing-private-key-and-csr"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Generate self-signed certificate from existing private key and csr</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# _len: 2048, 4096

-in ${_fd_csr} -req -days ${_days} -out ${_fd_out} )
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> _len: 2048, 4096</span>

openssl x509 -signkey <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> -nodes \
-in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_csr}</span> -req -days <span class="pl-smi">${_days}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_out}</span> )</pre></div>

<h6><a id="user-content-extract-private-key-from-pfx" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#extract-private-key-from-pfx"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Extract private key from pfx</h6>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# PKCS#7 file doesn't include private keys.
( _fd_p7b=&quot;cert.p7b&quot; ; _fd_pem=&quot;cert.pem&quot; ; \
openssl pkcs7 -inform DER -outform PEM -in ${_fd_p7b} -print_certs &gt; ${_fd_pem})
# or:
openssl pkcs7 -print_certs -in -in ${_fd_p7b} -out ${_fd_pem})
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> PKCS#7 file doesn't include private keys.</span>
( _fd_p7b=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>cert.p7b<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> _fd_pem=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>cert.pem<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl pkcs7 -inform DER -outform PEM -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_p7b}</span> -print_certs <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_pem}</span>)
<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> or:</span>
openssl pkcs7 -print_certs -in -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_p7b}</span> -out <span class="pl-smi">${_fd_pem}</span>)</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# 1)
( _fd=&quot;public.key&quot; ; \

# 2)

if [ $? = 0 ] ; then echo -en &quot;OK\n&quot; ; fi )
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 1)</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>public.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> 2)</span>
( _fd=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>private.key<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
openssl rsa -inform PEM -noout -in <span class="pl-smi">${_fd}</span> <span class="pl-k">&amp;</span><span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> /dev/null <span class="pl-k">;</span> \
<span class="pl-k">if</span> [ <span class="pl-smi">$?</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> 0 ] <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">then</span> <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> -en <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>OK\n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">fi</span> )</pre></div>

<ul>
<li><code>--proxy [socks5://|http://]</code> - set proxy server</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="curl -o file.pdf -C - https://example.com/Aiju2goo0Ja2.pdf

<h6><a id="user-content-check-dns-and-http-trace-with-headers-for-specific-domains" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#check-dns-and-http-trace-with-headers-for-specific-domains"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Check DNS and HTTP trace with headers for specific domains</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="### Set domains and external dns servers.
_domain_list=(google.com) ; _dns_list=(&quot;8.8.8.8&quot; &quot;1.1.1.1&quot;)

for _domain in &quot;${_domain_list[@]}&quot; ; do

  printf '=%.0s' {1..48}

  echo

  printf &quot;[\\e[1;32m+\\e[m] resolve: %s\\n&quot; &quot;$_domain&quot;

  for _dns in &quot;${_dns_list[@]}&quot; ; do

    # Resolve domain.
    host &quot;${_domain}&quot; &quot;${_dns}&quot;

    echo

  done

  for _proto in http https ; do

    printf &quot;[\\e[1;32m+\\e[m] trace + headers: %s://%s\\n&quot; &quot;$_proto&quot; &quot;$_domain&quot;

    # Get trace and http headers.
    curl -Iks -A &quot;x-agent&quot; --location &quot;${_proto}://${_domain}&quot;

    echo

  done

done

unset _domain_list _dns_list
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## Set domains and external dns servers.</span>
_domain_list=(google.com) <span class="pl-k">;</span> _dns_list=(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>8.8.8.8<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>1.1.1.1<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)

<span class="pl-k">for</span> <span class="pl-smi">_domain</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_domain_list[@]}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span>

  <span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>=%.0s<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> {1..48}

  <span class="pl-c1">echo</span>

  <span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>[<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>e[1;32m+<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>e[m] resolve: %s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_domain</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">for</span> <span class="pl-smi">_dns</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_dns_list[@]}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span>

    <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Resolve domain.</span>
    host <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_domain}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_dns}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span>

  <span class="pl-k">done</span>

  <span class="pl-k">for</span> <span class="pl-smi">_proto</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> http https <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span>

    <span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>[<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>e[1;32m+<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>e[m] trace + headers: %s://%s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_proto</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_domain</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

    <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Get trace and http headers.</span>
    curl -Iks -A <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>x-agent<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> --location <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_proto}</span>://<span class="pl-smi">${_domain}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span>

  <span class="pl-k">done</span>

<span class="pl-k">done</span>

<span class="pl-c1">unset</span> _domain_list _dns_list</pre></div>

<div class="snippet-clipboard-content position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Supported escape sequences:
~.  - terminate connection (and any multiplexed sessions)
~B  - send a BREAK to the remote system
~C  - open a command line
~R  - Request rekey (SSH protocol 2 only)
~^Z - suspend ssh
~#  - list forwarded connections
~&amp;  - background ssh (when waiting for connections to terminate)
~?  - this message
~~  - send the escape character by typing it twice
"><pre><code># Supported escape sequences:
~.  - terminate connection (and any multiplexed sessions)
~B  - send a BREAK to the remote system
~C  - open a command line
~R  - Request rekey (SSH protocol 2 only)
~^Z - suspend ssh
~#  - list forwarded connections
~&amp;  - background ssh (when waiting for connections to terminate)

~~  - send the escape character by typing it twice
</code></pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="function _ssh_sesslog() {

  _sesdir=&quot;&lt;path/to/session/logs&gt;&quot;

  mkdir -p &quot;${_sesdir}&quot; &amp;&amp; \
  ssh $@ 2&gt;&amp;1 | tee -a &quot;${_sesdir}/$(date +%Y%m%d).log&quot;

}

# Alias:
alias ssh='_ssh_sesslog'
"><pre><span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">_ssh_sesslog()</span> {

  _sesdir=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>&lt;path/to/session/logs&gt;<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  mkdir -p <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_sesdir}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&amp;&amp;</span> \
  ssh <span class="pl-smi">$@</span> <span class="pl-k">2&gt;&amp;1</span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> tee -a <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">${_sesdir}</span>/<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>date +%Y%m%d<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>.log<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

}

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Alias:</span>
<span class="pl-c1">alias</span> ssh=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>_ssh_sesslog<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-using-keychain-for-ssh-logins" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#using-keychain-for-ssh-logins"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Using Keychain for SSH logins</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="### Delete all of ssh-agent's keys.
function _scl() {

  /usr/bin/keychain --clear

}

### Add key to keychain.
function _scg() {

  /usr/bin/keychain /path/to/private-key
  source &quot;$HOME/.keychain/$HOSTNAME-sh&quot;

}
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## Delete all of ssh-agent's keys.</span>
<span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">_scl()</span> {

  /usr/bin/keychain --clear

}

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## Add key to keychain.</span>
<span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">_scg()</span> {

  /usr/bin/keychain /path/to/private-key
  <span class="pl-c1">source</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$HOME</span>/.keychain/<span class="pl-smi">$HOSTNAME</span>-sh<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

}</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-ssh-login-without-processing-any-login-scripts" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#ssh-login-without-processing-any-login-scripts"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>SSH login without processing any login scripts</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ssh -tt user@host bash
"><pre>ssh -tt user@host bash</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-ssh-local-port-forwarding" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#ssh-local-port-forwarding"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>SSH local port forwarding</h6>
<p>Example 1:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Forwarding our local 2250 port to nmap.org:443 from localhost through localhost
host1&gt; ssh -L 2250:nmap.org:443 localhost

# Connect to the service:
host1&gt; curl -Iks --location -X GET https://localhost:2250
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Forwarding our local 2250 port to nmap.org:443 from localhost through localhost</span>
host<span class="pl-k">1&gt;</span> ssh -L 2250:nmap.org:443 localhost

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Connect to the service:</span>
host<span class="pl-k">1&gt;</span> curl -Iks --location -X GET https://localhost:2250</pre></div>
<p>Example 2:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Forwarding our local 9051 port to db.d.x:5432 from localhost through node.d.y
host1&gt; ssh -nNT -L 9051:db.d.x:5432 node.d.y

# Connect to the service:
host1&gt; psql -U db_user -d db_dev -p 9051 -h localhost
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Forwarding our local 9051 port to db.d.x:5432 from localhost through node.d.y</span>
host<span class="pl-k">1&gt;</span> ssh -nNT -L 9051:db.d.x:5432 node.d.y

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Connect to the service:</span>
host<span class="pl-k">1&gt;</span> psql -U db_user -d db_dev -p 9051 -h localhost</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-n</code> - redirects stdin from <code>/dev/null</code></li>
<li><code>-N</code> - do not execute a remote command</li>
<li><code>-T</code> - disable pseudo-terminal allocation</li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-ssh-remote-port-forwarding" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#ssh-remote-port-forwarding"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>SSH remote port forwarding</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Forwarding our local 9051 port to db.d.x:5432 from host2 through node.d.y
host1&gt; ssh -nNT -R 9051:db.d.x:5432 node.d.y

# Connect to the service:
host2&gt; psql -U postgres -d postgres -p 8000 -h localhost
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Forwarding our local 9051 port to db.d.x:5432 from host2 through node.d.y</span>
host<span class="pl-k">1&gt;</span> ssh -nNT -R 9051:db.d.x:5432 node.d.y

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Connect to the service:</span>
host<span class="pl-k">2&gt;</span> psql -U postgres -d postgres -p 8000 -h localhost</pre></div>
<hr>
<h5><a id="user-content-tool-linux-dev" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-linux-dev"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="https://www.tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/devref1.html" rel="nofollow">linux-dev</a></h5>
<h6><a id="user-content-testing-remote-connection-to-port" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#testing-remote-connection-to-port"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Testing remote connection to port</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="timeout 1 bash -c &quot;&lt;/dev/&lt;proto&gt;/&lt;host&gt;/&lt;port&gt;&quot; &gt;/dev/null 2&gt;&amp;1 ; echo $?
"><pre>timeout 1 bash -c <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>&lt;/dev/&lt;proto&gt;/&lt;host&gt;/&lt;port&gt;<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>/dev/null <span class="pl-k">2&gt;&amp;1</span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> <span class="pl-smi">$?</span></pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>&lt;proto</code> - set protocol (tcp/udp)</li>
<li><code>&lt;host&gt;</code> - set remote host</li>
<li><code>&lt;port&gt;</code> - set destination port</li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-read-and-write-to-tcp-or-udp-sockets-with-common-bash-tools" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#read-and-write-to-tcp-or-udp-sockets-with-common-bash-tools"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Read and write to TCP or UDP sockets with common bash tools</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="exec 5&lt;&gt;/dev/tcp/&lt;host&gt;/&lt;port&gt;; cat &lt;&amp;5 &amp; cat &gt;&amp;5; exec 5&gt;&amp;-
"><pre><span class="pl-c1">exec</span> <span class="pl-k">5&lt;&gt;</span>/dev/tcp/<span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>host<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>/<span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>port<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span><span class="pl-k">;</span> cat <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-k">&amp;</span>5 <span class="pl-k">&amp;</span> cat <span class="pl-k">&gt;&amp;5</span><span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-c1">exec</span> <span class="pl-k">5&gt;&amp;</span>-</pre></div>
