<h5><a id="user-content-tool-tcpdump" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-tcpdump"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="http://www.tcpdump.org/" rel="nofollow">tcpdump</a></h5>
<h6><a id="user-content-filter-incoming-on-interface-traffic-specific-ipport" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#filter-incoming-on-interface-traffic-specific-ipport"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Filter incoming (on interface) traffic (specific ip:port)</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ne -i eth0 -Q in host 192.168.252.1 and port 443
"><pre>tcpdump -ne -i eth0 -Q <span class="pl-k">in</span> host 192.168.252.1 and port 443</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-n</code> - don't convert addresses (<code>-nn</code> will not resolve hostnames or ports)</li>
<li><code>-e</code> - print the link-level headers</li>
<li><code>-i [iface|any]</code> - set interface</li>
<li><code>-Q|-D [in|out|inout]</code> - choose send/receive direction (<code>-D</code> - for old tcpdump versions)</li>
<li><code>host [ip|hostname]</code> - set host, also <code>[host not]</code></li>
<li><code>[and|or]</code> - set logic</li>
<li><code>port [1-65535]</code> - set port number, also <code>[port not]</code></li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-filter-incoming-on-interface-traffic-specific-ipport-and-write-to-a-file" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#filter-incoming-on-interface-traffic-specific-ipport-and-write-to-a-file"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Filter incoming (on interface) traffic (specific ip:port) and write to a file</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ne -i eth0 -Q in host 192.168.252.1 and port 443 -c 5 -w tcpdump.pcap
"><pre>tcpdump -ne -i eth0 -Q <span class="pl-k">in</span> host 192.168.252.1 and port 443 -c 5 -w tcpdump.pcap</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-c [num]</code> - capture only num number of packets</li>
<li><code>-w [filename]</code> - write packets to file, <code>-r [filename]</code> - reading from file</li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-capture-all-icmp-packets" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#capture-all-icmp-packets"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Capture all ICMP packets</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -nei eth0 icmp
"><pre>tcpdump -nei eth0 icmp</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-check-protocol-used-tcp-or-udp-for-service" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#check-protocol-used-tcp-or-udp-for-service"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Check protocol used (TCP or UDP) for service</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -nei eth0 tcp port 22 -vv -X | egrep &quot;TCP|UDP&quot;
"><pre>tcpdump -nei eth0 tcp port 22 -vv -X <span class="pl-k">|</span> egrep <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>TCP|UDP<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-display-ascii-text-to-parse-the-output-using-grep-or-other" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#display-ascii-text-to-parse-the-output-using-grep-or-other"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Display ASCII text (to parse the output using grep or other)</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -i eth0 -A -s0 port 443
"><pre>tcpdump -i eth0 -A -s0 port 443</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-grab-everything-between-two-keywords" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#grab-everything-between-two-keywords"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Grab everything between two keywords</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -i eth0 port 80 -X | sed -n -e '/username/,/=ldap/ p'
"><pre>tcpdump -i eth0 port 80 -X <span class="pl-k">|</span> sed -n -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>/username/,/=ldap/ p<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-grab-user-and-pass-ever-plain-http" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#grab-user-and-pass-ever-plain-http"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Grab user and pass ever plain http</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -i eth0  port http -l -A | egrep -i \
'pass=|pwd=|log=|login=|user=|username=|pw=|passw=|passwd=|password=|pass:|user:|username:|password:|login:|pass |user ' \
--color=auto --line-buffered -B20
"><pre>tcpdump -i eth0  port http -l -A <span class="pl-k">|</span> egrep -i \
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>pass=|pwd=|log=|login=|user=|username=|pw=|passw=|passwd=|password=|pass:|user:|username:|password:|login:|pass |user <span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> \
--color=auto --line-buffered -B20</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-extract-http-user-agent-from-http-request-header" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#extract-http-user-agent-from-http-request-header"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Extract HTTP User Agent from HTTP request header</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ei eth0 -nn -A -s1500 -l | grep &quot;User-Agent:&quot;
"><pre>tcpdump -ei eth0 -nn -A -s1500 -l <span class="pl-k">|</span> grep <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>User-Agent:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-capture-only-http-get-and-post-packets" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#capture-only-http-get-and-post-packets"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Capture only HTTP GET and POST packets</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ei eth0 -s 0 -A -vv \
'tcp[((tcp[12:1] &amp; 0xf0) &gt;&gt; 2):4] = 0x47455420' or 'tcp[((tcp[12:1] &amp; 0xf0) &gt;&gt; 2):4] = 0x504f5354'
"><pre>tcpdump -ei eth0 -s 0 -A -vv \
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>tcp[((tcp[12:1] &amp; 0xf0) &gt;&gt; 2):4] = 0x47455420<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> or <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>tcp[((tcp[12:1] &amp; 0xf0) &gt;&gt; 2):4] = 0x504f5354<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>
<p>or simply:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ei eth0 -s 0 -v -n -l | egrep -i &quot;POST /|GET /|Host:&quot;
"><pre>tcpdump -ei eth0 -s 0 -v -n -l <span class="pl-k">|</span> egrep -i <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>POST /|GET /|Host:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-rotate-capture-files" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#rotate-capture-files"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Rotate capture files</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ei eth0 -w /tmp/capture-%H.pcap -G 3600 -C 200
"><pre>tcpdump -ei eth0 -w /tmp/capture-%H.pcap -G 3600 -C 200</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-G &lt;num&gt;</code> - pcap will be created every <code>&lt;num&gt;</code> seconds</li>
<li><code>-C &lt;size&gt;</code> - close the current pcap and open a new one if is larger than <code>&lt;size&gt;</code></li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-top-hosts-by-packets" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#top-hosts-by-packets"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Top hosts by packets</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="tcpdump -ei enp0s25 -nnn -t -c 200 | cut -f 1,2,3,4 -d '.' | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head -n 20
"><pre>tcpdump -ei enp0s25 -nnn -t -c 200 <span class="pl-k">|</span> cut -f 1,2,3,4 -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>.<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> sort <span class="pl-k">|</span> uniq -c <span class="pl-k">|</span> sort -nr <span class="pl-k">|</span> head -n 20</pre></div>

"><pre>tcpdump -nei eth0 <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>not (src net (10 or 172.16/12 or 192.168/16) and dst net (10 or 172.16/12 or 192.168/16))<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>

<h5><a id="user-content-tool-tcpick" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-tcpick"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="http://tcpick.sourceforge.net/" rel="nofollow">tcpick</a></h5>
<h6><a id="user-content-analyse-packets-in-real-time" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#analyse-packets-in-real-time"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Analyse packets in real-time</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="while true ; do tcpick -a -C -r dump.pcap ; sleep 2 ; clear ; done

<h5><a id="user-content-tool-ngrep" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-ngrep"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="http://ngrep.sourceforge.net/usage.html" rel="nofollow">ngrep</a></h5>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ngrep -d eth0 &quot;www.domain.com&quot; port 443
"><pre>ngrep -d eth0 <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>www.domain.com<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> port 443</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-d [iface|any]</code> - set interface</li>
<li><code>[domain]</code> - set hostname</li>
<li><code>port [1-65535]</code> - set port number</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ngrep -d eth0 &quot;www.domain.com&quot; src host 10.240.20.2 and port 443
"><pre>ngrep -d eth0 <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>www.domain.com<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> src host 10.240.20.2 and port 443</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>(host [ip|hostname])</code> - filter by ip or hostname</li>
<li><code>(port [1-65535])</code> - filter by port number</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ngrep -d eth0 -qt -O ngrep.pcap &quot;www.domain.com&quot; port 443
"><pre>ngrep -d eth0 -qt -O ngrep.pcap <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>www.domain.com<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> port 443</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-q</code> - quiet mode (only payloads)</li>
<li><code>-t</code> - added timestamps</li>
<li><code>-O [filename]</code> - save output to file, <code>-I [filename]</code> - reading from file</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ngrep -d eth0 -qt 'HTTP' 'tcp'
"><pre>ngrep -d eth0 -qt <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>HTTP<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>tcp<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>HTTP</code> - show http headers</li>
<li><code>tcp|udp</code> - set protocol</li>
<li><code>[src|dst] host [ip|hostname]</code> - set direction for specific node</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="ngrep -l -q -d eth0 -i &quot;User-Agent: curl*&quot;
"><pre>ngrep -l -q -d eth0 -i <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>User-Agent: curl*<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-l</code> - stdout line buffered</li>
<li><code>-i</code> - case-insensitive search</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h5><a id="user-content-tool-hping3" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-hping3"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="http://www.hping.org/" rel="nofollow">hping3</a></h5>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="hping3 -V -p 80 -s 5050 &lt;scan_type&gt; www.google.com
"><pre>hping3 -V -p 80 -s 5050 <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>scan_type<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> www.google.com</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-V|--verbose</code> - verbose mode</li>
<li><code>-p|--destport</code> - set destination port</li>
<li><code>-s|--baseport</code> - set source port</li>
<li><code>&lt;scan_type&gt;</code> - set scan type
<ul>
<li><code>-F|--fin</code> - set FIN flag, port open if no reply</li>
<li><code>-S|--syn</code> - set SYN flag</li>
<li><code>-P|--push</code> - set PUSH flag</li>
<li><code>-A|--ack</code> - set ACK flag (use when ping is blocked, RST response back if the port is open)</li>
<li><code>-U|--urg</code> - set URG flag</li>
<li><code>-Y|--ymas</code> - set Y unused flag (0x80 - nullscan), port open if no reply</li>
<li><code>-M 0 -UPF</code> - set TCP sequence number and scan type (URG+PUSH+FIN), port open if no reply</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="hping3 -V -c 1 -1 -C 8 www.google.com
"><pre>hping3 -V -c 1 -1 -C 8 www.google.com</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-c [num]</code> - packet count</li>
<li><code>-1</code> - set ICMP mode</li>
<li><code>-C|--icmptype [icmp-num]</code> - set icmp type (default icmp-echo = 8)</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="hping3 -V -c 1000000 -d 120 -S -w 64 -p 80 --flood --rand-source &lt;remote_host&gt;
"><pre>hping3 -V -c 1000000 -d 120 -S -w 64 -p 80 --flood --rand-source <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>remote_host<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span></pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>--flood</code> - sent packets as fast as possible (don't show replies)</li>
<li><code>--rand-source</code> - random source address mode</li>
<li><code>-d --data</code> - data size</li>
<li><code>-w|--win</code> - winsize (default 64)</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h5><a id="user-content-tool-nmap" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-nmap"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="https://nmap.org/" rel="nofollow">nmap</a></h5>
<h6><a id="user-content-ping-scans-the-network" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#ping-scans-the-network"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Ping scans the network</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nmap -sP 192.168.0.0/24
"><pre>nmap -sP 192.168.0.0/24</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-show-only-open-ports" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#show-only-open-ports"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Show only open ports</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nmap -F --open 192.168.0.0/24
"><pre>nmap -F --open 192.168.0.0/24</pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-full-tcp-port-scan-using-with-service-version-detection" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#full-tcp-port-scan-using-with-service-version-detection"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Full TCP port scan using with service version detection</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nmap -p 1-65535 -sV -sS -T4 192.168.0.0/24
"><pre>nmap -p 1-65535 -sV -sS -T4 192.168.0.0/24</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Set variables:
_hosts=&quot;192.168.250.10&quot;
_ports=&quot;80,443&quot;

# Set Nmap NSE scripts stack:
_nmap_nse_scripts=&quot;+dns-brute,\
                   +http-auth-finder,\
                   +http-chrono,\
                   +http-cookie-flags,\
                   +http-cors,\
                   +http-cross-domain-policy,\
                   +http-csrf,\
                   +http-dombased-xss,\
                   +http-enum,\
                   +http-errors,\
                   +http-git,\
                   +http-grep,\
                   +http-internal-ip-disclosure,\
                   +http-jsonp-detection,\
                   +http-malware-host,\
                   +http-methods,\
                   +http-passwd,\
                   +http-phpself-xss,\
                   +http-php-version,\
                   +http-robots.txt,\
                   +http-sitemap-generator,\
                   +http-shellshock,\
                   +http-stored-xss,\
                   +http-title,\
                   +http-unsafe-output-escaping,\
                   +http-useragent-tester,\
                   +http-vhosts,\
                   +http-waf-detect,\
                   +http-waf-fingerprint,\
                   +http-xssed,\
                   +traceroute-geolocation.nse,\
                   +ssl-enum-ciphers,\
                   +whois-domain,\
                   +whois-ip&quot;

# Set Nmap NSE script params:
_nmap_nse_scripts_args=&quot;dns-brute.domain=${_hosts},http-cross-domain-policy.domain-lookup=true,&quot;
_nmap_nse_scripts_args+=&quot;http-waf-detect.aggro,http-waf-detect.detectBodyChanges,&quot;
_nmap_nse_scripts_args+=&quot;http-waf-fingerprint.intensive=1&quot;

# Perform scan:
nmap --script=&quot;$_nmap_nse_scripts&quot; --script-args=&quot;$_nmap_nse_scripts_args&quot; -p &quot;$_ports&quot; &quot;$_hosts&quot;

<span class="pl-s">                   +http-csrf,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-dombased-xss,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-enum,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-errors,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-git,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-grep,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-internal-ip-disclosure,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-jsonp-detection,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-malware-host,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-methods,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-passwd,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-phpself-xss,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-php-version,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-robots.txt,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-sitemap-generator,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-shellshock,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-stored-xss,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-title,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-unsafe-output-escaping,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-useragent-tester,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-vhosts,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-waf-detect,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-waf-fingerprint,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +http-xssed,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +traceroute-geolocation.nse,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +ssl-enum-ciphers,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +whois-domain,<span class="pl-cce">\</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">                   +whois-ip<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Perform scan:</span>
nmap --script=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_nmap_nse_scripts</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> --script-args=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_nmap_nse_scripts_args</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> -p <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_ports</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_hosts</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nc -kl 5000
"><pre>nc -kl 5000</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-l</code> - listen for an incoming connection</li>
<li><code>-k</code> - listening after client has disconnected</li>
<li><code>&gt;filename.out</code> - save receive data to file (optional)</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nc 192.168.0.1 5051 &lt; filename.in
"><pre>nc 192.168.0.1 5051 <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span> filename.in</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>&lt; filename.in</code> - send data to remote host</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nc -vz 10.240.30.3 5000
"><pre>nc -vz 10.240.30.3 5000</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-v</code> - verbose output</li>
<li><code>-z</code> - scan for listening daemons</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="nc -vzu 10.240.30.3 1-65535
"><pre>nc -vzu 10.240.30.3 1-65535</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-u</code> - scan only udp ports</li>
</ul>

server<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> cat /tmp/f <span class="pl-k">|</span> /bin/bash -i <span class="pl-k">2&gt;&amp;1</span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> nc -l 127.0.0.1 5000 <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> /tmp/f

<h6><a id="user-content-simple-minimal-http-server" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#simple-minimal-http-server"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Simple minimal HTTP Server</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="while true ; do nc -l -p 1500 -c 'echo -e &quot;HTTP/1.1 200 OK\n\n $(date)&quot;' ; done
"><pre><span class="pl-k">while</span> <span class="pl-c1">true</span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span> nc -l -p 1500 -c <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>echo -e "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\n\n $(date)"<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">done</span></pre></div>
<h6><a id="user-content-simple-http-server" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#simple-http-server"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Simple HTTP Server</h6>
<blockquote>
<p>Restarts web server after each request - remove <code>while</code> condition for only single connection.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="cat &gt; index.html &lt;&lt; __EOF__
&lt;!doctype html&gt;
    &lt;head&gt;
        &lt;meta charset=&quot;utf-8&quot;&gt;
        &lt;meta http-equiv=&quot;X-UA-Compatible&quot; content=&quot;IE=edge,chrome=1&quot;&gt;
        &lt;title&gt;&lt;/title&gt;
        &lt;meta name=&quot;description&quot; content=&quot;&quot;&gt;
        &lt;meta name=&quot;viewport&quot; content=&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1&quot;&gt;
    &lt;/head&gt;
    &lt;body&gt;

    &lt;p&gt;

      Hello! It's a site.

    &lt;/p&gt;

    &lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;
__EOF__
"><pre>cat <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> index.html <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span>
<span class="pl-s">&lt;!doctype html&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;head&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">        &lt;meta charset="utf-8"&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">        &lt;meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">        &lt;title&gt;&lt;/title&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">        &lt;meta name="description" content=""&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">        &lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;/head&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;body&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;p&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">      Hello! It's a site.</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;/p&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s"></span>
<span class="pl-s">    &lt;/body&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s">&lt;/html&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-k">__EOF__</span></span></pre></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="server&gt; while : ; do \
(echo -ne &quot;HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: $(wc -c &lt;index.html)\r\n\r\n&quot; ; cat index.html;) | \
nc -l -p 5000 \
; done
"><pre>server<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> <span class="pl-k">while</span> <span class="pl-c1">:</span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span> \
(echo -ne <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>wc -c <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>index.html<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>\r\n\r\n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> cat index.html<span class="pl-k">;</span>) <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
nc -l -p 5000 \
<span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">done</span></pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-p</code> - port number</li>
</ul>
<h6><a id="user-content-simple-http-proxy-single-connection" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#simple-http-proxy-single-connection"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Simple HTTP Proxy (single connection)</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="#!/usr/bin/env bash

if [[ $# != 2 ]] ; then
  printf &quot;%s\\n&quot; \
         &quot;usage: ./nc-proxy listen-port bk_host:bk_port&quot;
fi

_listen_port=&quot;$1&quot;
_bk_host=$(echo &quot;$2&quot; | cut -d &quot;:&quot; -f1)
_bk_port=$(echo &quot;$2&quot; | cut -d &quot;:&quot; -f2)

printf &quot;  lport: %s\\nbk_host: %s\\nbk_port: %s\\n\\n&quot; \
       &quot;$_listen_port&quot; &quot;$_bk_host&quot; &quot;$_bk_port&quot;

_tmp=$(mktemp -d)
_back=&quot;$_tmp/pipe.back&quot;
_sent=&quot;$_tmp/pipe.sent&quot;
_recv=&quot;$_tmp/pipe.recv&quot;

trap 'rm -rf &quot;$_tmp&quot;' EXIT

mkfifo -m 0600 &quot;$_back&quot; &quot;$_sent&quot; &quot;$_recv&quot;

sed &quot;s/^/=&gt; /&quot; &lt;&quot;$_sent&quot; &amp;
sed &quot;s/^/&lt;=  /&quot; &lt;&quot;$_recv&quot; &amp;

nc -l -p &quot;$_listen_port&quot; &lt;&quot;$_back&quot; | \
tee &quot;$_sent&quot; | \
nc &quot;$_bk_host&quot; &quot;$_bk_port&quot; | \
tee &quot;$_recv&quot; &gt;&quot;$_back&quot;
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#!</span>/usr/bin/env bash</span>

<span class="pl-k">if</span> [[ <span class="pl-smi">$#</span> <span class="pl-k">!=</span> 2 ]] <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">then</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>%s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> \
         <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>usage: ./nc-proxy listen-port bk_host:bk_port<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
<span class="pl-k">fi</span>

_listen_port=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$1</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
_bk_host=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>echo <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$2</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> cut -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> -f1<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>
_bk_port=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>echo <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$2</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> cut -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> -f2<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>

<span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>  lport: %s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>nbk_host: %s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>nbk_port: %s<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> \
       <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_listen_port</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_bk_host</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_bk_port</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

_tmp=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>mktemp -d<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>
_back=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_tmp</span>/pipe.back<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
_sent=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_tmp</span>/pipe.sent<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
_recv=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_tmp</span>/pipe.recv<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

<span class="pl-c1">trap</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>rm -rf "$_tmp"<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> EXIT

mkfifo -m 0600 <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_back</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_sent</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_recv</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

sed <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>s/^/=&gt; /<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_sent</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&amp;</span>
sed <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>s/^/&lt;=  /<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_recv</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&amp;</span>

nc -l -p <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_listen_port</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_back</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
tee <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_sent</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
nc <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_bk_host</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_bk_port</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
tee <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_recv</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_back</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>

"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## TCP -&gt; TCP</span>

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## UDP -&gt; UDP</span>

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>## UDP -&gt; TCP</span>

<h6><a id="user-content-redirecting-tcp-traffic-to-a-unix-domain-socket-under-linux" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#redirecting-tcp-traffic-to-a-unix-domain-socket-under-linux"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Redirecting TCP-traffic to a UNIX domain socket under Linux</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="socat TCP-LISTEN:1234,bind=127.0.0.1,reuseaddr,fork,su=nobody,range=127.0.0.0/8 UNIX-CLIENT:/tmp/foo
"><pre>socat TCP-LISTEN:1234,bind=127.0.0.1,reuseaddr,fork,su=nobody,range=127.0.0.0/8 UNIX-CLIENT:/tmp/foo</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>TCP-LISTEN:&lt;params&gt;</code> - set tcp listen with specific params
<ul>
<li><code>[1-65535]</code> - set port number</li>
<li><code>bind=[hostname|ip]</code> - set bind hostname/ip</li>
<li><code>reuseaddr</code> - allows other sockets to bind to an address</li>
<li><code>fork</code> - keeps the parent process attempting to produce more connections</li>
<li><code>su=nobody</code> - set user</li>
<li><code>range=[ip-range]</code> - ip range</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><code>UNIX-CLIENT:&lt;params&gt;</code> - communicates with the specified peer socket
<ul>
<li><code>filename</code> - define socket</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h5><a id="user-content-tool-p0f" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tool-p0f"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Tool: <a href="http://lcamtuf.coredump.cx/p0f3/" rel="nofollow">p0f</a></h5>
<h6><a id="user-content-set-iface-in-promiscuous-mode-and-dump-traffic-to-the-log-file" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#set-iface-in-promiscuous-mode-and-dump-traffic-to-the-log-file"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Set iface in promiscuous mode and dump traffic to the log file</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="p0f -i enp0s25 -p -d -o /dump/enp0s25.log
"><pre>p0f -i enp0s25 -p -d -o /dump/enp0s25.log</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>-i</code> - listen on the specified interface</li>
<li><code>-p</code> - set interface in promiscuous mode</li>
<li><code>-d</code> - fork into background</li>
<li><code>-o</code> - output file</li>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="AS=&quot;AS32934&quot;
whois -h whois.radb.net -- &quot;-i origin ${AS}&quot; | \
grep &quot;^route:&quot; | \
cut -d &quot;:&quot; -f2 | \
sed -e 's/^[ \t]//' | \
sort -n -t . -k 1,1 -k 2,2 -k 3,3 -k 4,4 | \
cut -d &quot;:&quot; -f2 | \
sed -e 's/^[ \t]/allow /' | \
sed 's/$/;/' | \
sed 's/allow  */subnet -&gt; /g'
"><pre>AS=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>AS32934<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
whois -h whois.radb.net -- <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>-i origin <span class="pl-smi">${AS}</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
grep <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>^route:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
cut -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> -f2 <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
sed -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/^[ \t]//<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
sort -n -t <span class="pl-c1">.</span> -k 1,1 -k 2,2 -k 3,3 -k 4,4 <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
cut -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>:<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> -f2 <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
sed -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/^[ \t]/allow /<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
sed <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/$/;/<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \
sed <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/allow  */subnet -&gt; /g<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span></pre></div>

from http.server import HTTPServer, BaseHTTPRequestHandler
import ssl

httpd = HTTPServer(('localhost', 4443), BaseHTTPRequestHandler)

httpd.socket = ssl.wrap_socket (httpd.socket,
        keyfile=&quot;path/to/key.pem&quot;,
        certfile='path/to/cert.pem', server_side=True)

httpd.serve_forever()

        certfile='path/to/cert.pem', server_side=True)

httpd.serve_forever()

"><pre>awk <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>/<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>date -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>1 hours ago<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>+%d<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>/%b<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>/%Y:%H:%M<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>/,/<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>date <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>+%d<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>/%b<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>/%Y:%H:%M<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>/ { print $0 }<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> \

<h6><a id="user-content-replace-newlines-with-a-space" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#replace-newlines-with-a-space"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Replace newline(s) with a space</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ /g' /path/to/file

# cross-platform compatible syntax:
sed -e ':a' -e 'N' -e '$!ba' -e 's/\n/ /g' /path/to/file
"><pre>sed <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>:a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ /g<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> /path/to/file

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> cross-platform compatible syntax:</span>
sed -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>:a<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>N<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>$!ba<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/\n/ /g<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> /path/to/file</pre></div>
<ul>
<li><code>:a</code> create a label <code>a</code></li>
<li><code>N</code> append the next line to the pattern space</li>
<li><code>$!</code> if not the last line, ba branch (go to) label <code>a</code></li>
<li><code>s</code> substitute, <code>/\n/</code> regex for new line, <code>/ /</code> by a space, <code>/g</code> global match (as many times as it can)</li>
</ul>
<p>Alternatives:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# perl version (sed-like speed):
perl -p -e 's/\n/ /' /path/to/file

# bash version (slow):
while read line ; do printf &quot;%s&quot; &quot;$line &quot; ; done &lt; file
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> perl version (sed-like speed):</span>
perl -p -e <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>s/\n/ /<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> /path/to/file

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> bash version (slow):</span>
<span class="pl-k">while</span> <span class="pl-c1">read</span> line <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span> <span class="pl-c1">printf</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>%s<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$line</span> <span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">done</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span> file</pre></div>

<h6><a id="user-content-domain-resolve" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#domain-resolve"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Domain resolve</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Dependencies:
#   - curl
#   - jq

function DomainResolve() {

  local _host=&quot;$1&quot;

  local _curl_base=&quot;curl --request GET&quot;
  local _timeout=&quot;15&quot;

  _host_ip=$($_curl_base -ks -m &quot;$_timeout&quot; &quot;https://dns.google.com/resolve?name=${_host}&amp;type=A&quot; | \
  jq '.Answer[0].data' | tr -d &quot;\&quot;&quot; 2&gt;/dev/null)

  if [[ -z &quot;$_host_ip&quot; ]] || [[ &quot;$_host_ip&quot; == &quot;null&quot; ]] ; then

    echo -en &quot;Unsuccessful domain name resolution.\\n&quot;

  else

    echo -en &quot;$_host &gt; $_host_ip\\n&quot;

  fi

}
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Dependencies:</span>
<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>   - curl</span>
<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>   - jq</span>

<span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">DomainResolve()</span> {

  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _host=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$1</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _curl_base=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>curl --request GET<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _timeout=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>15<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  _host_ip=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span><span class="pl-smi">$_curl_base</span> -ks -m <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_timeout</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>https://dns.google.com/resolve?name=<span class="pl-smi">${_host}</span>&amp;type=A<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> \</span>
<span class="pl-s">  jq <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>.Answer[0].data<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> <span class="pl-k">|</span> tr -d <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-cce">\"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">2&gt;</span>/dev/null<span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">if</span> [[ <span class="pl-k">-z</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_host_ip</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> ]] <span class="pl-k">||</span> [[ <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_host_ip</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>null<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> ]] <span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">then</span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> -en <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Unsuccessful domain name resolution.<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">else</span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> -en <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_host</span> &gt; <span class="pl-smi">$_host_ip</span><span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">fi</span>

}</pre></div>

<h6><a id="user-content-get-asn" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#get-asn"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Get ASN</h6>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell position-relative" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="# Dependencies:
#   - curl

function GetASN() {

  local _ip=&quot;$1&quot;

  local _curl_base=&quot;curl --request GET&quot;
  local _timeout=&quot;15&quot;

  _asn=$($_curl_base -ks -m &quot;$_timeout&quot; &quot;http://ip-api.com/line/${_ip}?fields=as&quot;)

  _state=$(echo $?)

  if [[ -z &quot;$_ip&quot; ]] || [[ &quot;$_ip&quot; == &quot;null&quot; ]] || [[ &quot;$_state&quot; -ne 0 ]]; then

    echo -en &quot;Unsuccessful ASN gathering.\\n&quot;

  else

    echo -en &quot;$_ip &gt; $_asn\\n&quot;

  fi

}
"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Dependencies:</span>
<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span>   - curl</span>

<span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">GetASN()</span> {

  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _ip=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$1</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _curl_base=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>curl --request GET<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
  <span class="pl-k">local</span> _timeout=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>15<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  _asn=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span><span class="pl-smi">$_curl_base</span> -ks -m <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_timeout</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>http://ip-api.com/line/<span class="pl-smi">${_ip}</span>?fields=as<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>

  _state=<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">$(</span>echo <span class="pl-smi">$?</span><span class="pl-pds">)</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">if</span> [[ <span class="pl-k">-z</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_ip</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> ]] <span class="pl-k">||</span> [[ <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_ip</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>null<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> ]] <span class="pl-k">||</span> [[ <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_state</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">-ne</span> 0 ]]<span class="pl-k">;</span> <span class="pl-k">then</span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> -en <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Unsuccessful ASN gathering.<span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">else</span>

    <span class="pl-c1">echo</span> -en <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-smi">$_ip</span> &gt; <span class="pl-smi">$_asn</span><span class="pl-cce">\\</span>n<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>

  <span class="pl-k">fi</span>

}</pre></div>
